name: DEADLAND (public)
description:
!THIS VERSION IS UNSTABLE! Please report any and all bugs you find.

Give feedback too! I'm taking suggestions for content and improvements.

The objective is to get 4 full sets of lightning armor (Z-9 Zilabro and lightnings helmet), along with 4 drum magazine AKs. 

CHANGES:

  • Added AS-VAL, AUG-A3
  • Improved weapon modding
  • Improved the way equipping works
  • Added a main menu
  • Made foregrips actually work
  • Improved recoil on guns
  • Fixed the bug where chemical wouldn't do anything when you had no gas mask on
  • Buffed Spettys on chemical
  • Removed actual body armor from the Rat loot pool
  • Improved the weapons system to allow for more modularity later on

KEYBINDS:

  • WASD to move
  • R to reload
  • E to interact
  • E to extract
  • Right click a body to loot it
  • Press 1, 2 and 3 o pick loot up from bodies.
